name: Lucifia: The Realm of Arachna
description: Lucifia, a descendant of a powerful and ruthless witch, who's been running for years from her legacy,  needs to find a way to get out of the Realm of Arachna. To do so, she needs to find the three special eggs of the dark Queens. However, to do so, she needs to survive and defeat the enemies she finds on her way.
